title: Apply to make change to a council flat

customer.title: Council Tenant - David
customer.content: David is 52 and lives in a council flat in South London. He works part-time and has lived in the same property for over 20 years. He is comfortable using a smartphone for day-to-day tasks like messaging, browsing and paying bills. He prefers online services if they are clear and don’t require too many steps.

need.title: Apply to make changes to his council flat
need.content: David wants to make small changes to his flat, he wants to install a new kitchen and adding a handrail. He needs a simple online form to request permission from the housing team and upload photos or plans. He wants to know what he can and can’t do, and how long a decision will take.

concern.title: Worried about delays or not getting updates
concern.content: David is worried he won’t hear back for a long time or that he’ll miss an important update if it only comes by letter. He also doesn’t want to do something wrong and risk breaking his tenancy agreement.
